0 :
1 OPEN "EmpireDATB" FOR OUTPUT AS #1
10 FOR I=1 TO 10:READ A$,B$:WRITE #1,A$+B$
15 FOR J=1 TO 452:READ C:WRITE #1,C:NEXT:NEXT
20 READ A$,B$:WRITE #1,A$+B$:CLOSE #1:PRINT "OK"
